NOTICE_DATA.ORIGINAL_CPV: Installation of doors and windows and related components
Roof works and other special trade construction works
Erection and related works of roof frames and coverings
Works for complete or part construction and civil engineering work

CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Union, with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 01A03

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.ADDRESS: Solis One, Rising Sun Industrial Estate,

SHORT_DESCR.P: This procurement seeks the appointment of contractors to a 4 year framework agreement for the provision of works in relation to property maintenance services. Trivallis is named in the contract notice; however, it is only Tai Calon that has committed to using this framework. The framework will be open to any other Welsh RSL's including local authorities.
Lot 1 — Internal Works includes works required to carry out kitchen, bathroom and electrical refurbishments. Further information is provided within the procurement documents.
Lot 2 — Doors only relates to the supply and fit of external doors. Further information is provided within the procurement documents.
Lot 3 — Roofing — re-roofing works to existing properties. Further information is provided within the procurement documents.
Lot 4 — Brickwork and External Works includes works to the property and works within the curtilage of the property. Further information is provided within the procurement documents.
Lot 5 — Responsive Repairs is for ad-hoc repairs to properties. Further information is provided within the procurement documents.
Lot 6 — Voids and General Building Works relates to works required to relet a property. Further information is provided within the procurement documents.
Lot 7 — Drainage works relates to both repairs and clearance works.Further information is provided within the procurement documents.
Lot 8 — General Aids and Adaptations, works relating to adaptations such as shower rooms and ramps. Further information is provided within the procurement documents.
Lot 9 — Specialist aids and adaptations relates to installations and maintenance of stairlifts, vertical lifts, hoists etc. Further information is provided within the procurement documents.
